1373: Eustacius was born in Die lange straet2 in 1373.
1378: Lost sibling Segherarden in 1378 when Segherarden was 7.
1385: Lost mother at the age of 12 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 12.
Became caretaker of Diewiven, Ryccie, Aleberna, Hersewindis, Auesoete at age 13.
1389: Lost father at the age of 16.
1392: Got married to Clementia at age 20 in 1392.
Eustacius moved to Uterechse straet.A.2 after marriage.
1393: Had a daughter with Clementia, Mette, at age 20.
Became caretaker of Mette at age 21.
Got married a second time to Cofte at age 21 in 1393.
Had Cofte move in at Uterechse straet.A.2 after marriage.
1394: Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 0 years old.
Cofte gave birth to their stillborn daughter Cofte in 1394.
1396: Had a son with Cofte, Siccone, at age 23.
1397: Had a daughter with Cofte, Aleberna, at age 24.
1398: Lost daughter Aleberna when Aleberna was 2 years old.
